Text: Law Clerk PositionNonPrivilegedpst Hi Gerald I hope that things have gone well with your first set of law clerks I was writing to confirm that I will be starting work for you next Monday July I have been trying to contact the HR representative that I spoke with initially but she hasnt returned my calls I just wanted to make sure that everything was set for me to begin working I also wanted to let you know that I heard from the HBA about the photograph you recommended me for I wanted to thank you for remembering me I think that will be a great opportunity for me If you need to contact me my phone number is or my mobile is Sincerely Alisha Mahabir Do You Yahoo Get personalized email addresses from Yahoo Mail
